p: For the molecular assays, we collected peripheral blood and cerebrospinal fluid samples at different timepoints: peripheral blood was collected on the day of cell transplantation (day 0), three days, seven days, one month, three months, and six months after transplantation, while CSF was collected on day 0 and one month after the procedure. The peripheral venous blood (ca. 10 mL) was collected into tubes containing EDTA as an anticoagulant.
